about_the_game:
Nephilim Resurrection is a thrilling retro-style first-person shooter that immerses players in an ancient Mesopotamian steampunk world. Set against the backdrop of an alternate ancient civilization, the game seamlessly blends historical aesthetics with futuristic steam-powered technology. As a lone survivor, you’ll navigate a perilous ancient world, safeguarding your most precious cargo; and the weight of this unspoken burden rests upon your shoulders.

Frenetic Boomer Shooter Action:

Engage in classic boomer shooter game play, where adrenaline-fueled combat meets cerebral puzzles and strategic encounters.

Thundering Heavy Metal Soundtrack:

The pulse-pounding retro-meets-progressive-heavy metal-inspired soundtrack, underpins your harrowing journey.

Shape Your Destiny:

Act swiftly to determine the fate the protagonist and their prize in a world teetering on the edge of transformation and ruin.



  • First-Person Perspective: Experience the action from a first-person viewpoint.
  • Single-Player Focus: Tailored for solo play, the game emphasizes PvE encounters.
  • Meticulously Designed Levels: Navigate through intricately crafted environments, each filled with challenges and combat sequences against waves of enemies and challenging bosses with puzzle platforming elements.
  • Diverse Arsenal: Choose from five powerful weapons, each offering a distinct playstyle. Adapt your strategy to overcome adversaries.
  • Unlock Special Abilities: Breathe underwater, manipulate time, and execute gravity-defying double jumps.
  • Created by an independent company Arrogant Pixel. 100% self-published and self-funded.
  • Music and Sound Design is a big focus in our games, and we've got another full soundtrack composed by AssadB and performed by our in-house metal band "NEPHILLIM RESURRECTION"

highlighted.name: Cosmic Power In A Tiny Space!

content_descriptors.notes:
In "Nephilim Resurrection," players can expect mature content typical of a boomer shooter genre, including depictions of violence as the player engages in combat against enemies. However, there are no depictions of sexual acts or explicit sexual content in the game. The storyline primarily revolves around themes of heroism, sacrifice, and redemption, without elements such as sexual assault, drug and alcohol abuse, or self-harm.

While the game features intense combat and action-packed gameplay, it is free from any explicit or graphic content that may be sensitive or triggering to certain players. As a boomer shooter, the primary focus is on defeating enemies and overcoming challenges within the game world. We are committed to providing an engaging and immersive experience while respecting the boundaries and sensitivities of our players.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+) and Windows 10, 64-bit versions only.
  • Processor: X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support (Intel Core i5 or better)
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, and DX12-capable GPUs (NVidia or AMD)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Embark on a furious journey, protecting precious cargo in a perilous world. Boomer shooter mechanics blend with puzzles and strategic encounters. Engage in PvE action, solve puzzles, and battle foes to a heavy metal soundtrack, immersing you in the adrenaline-fueled atmosphere.
